content: Set terminal title for implementation work
Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Add HANDLER_BEVY_GET_WATCH constant to tools.rs after line 101

Create get_watch_tools() function in tool_definitions.rs with bevy_get_watch definition
Add tools.extend(get_watch_tools()) to get_all_tools() in tool_definitions.rs
Build and fix any compile errors/warnings after adding tool definition
Add HANDLER_BEVY_GET_WATCH case to generate_local_handler() in tool_generator.rs

Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues (no dead code markers, no underscore prefixes)
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
